name: Butt Naked & Big Guns
description:
Big Guns just got fired and had all her money stolen from her account. She now has to work for a slave driver of a boss, the psychopathic Butt Naked. She must kill monsters and pests or end up on skid row.


Butt Naked & Big Guns is a side-scrolling platformer action game.
Run and Gun, kill the pests, unravel a Butt Naked story while trying to make a buck while sometimes naked.
